root.name: BlackSpace
root.description: OverviewAnnounced on Feb 23, 2012, BlackSpace is the debut project of PixelFoundry. In BlackSpace, players are responsible for managing mining operations on procedurally generated asteroids found in the unexplored frontiers of space. The player will interact with much of the game by means of controlling a low-gravity multi-functional vehicle. The action of the game will span the entire surface of the asteroid, all the way up into orbit around it.BlackSpace is scheduled to be released on the PC as a downloadable game in Q4, 2012.
